mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM article_tags at INNER JOIN article a ON at.article_id = a.article_id WHERE at.tag_id = #{tagId};

SELECT a.article_id, a.title, a.click, a.comment, a.create_time, a.summary, a.user_id, a.is_original FROM article_tags at INNER JOIN article a ON at.article_id = a.article_id WHERE at.tag_id = #{tagId} LIMIT #{begin},#{pageSize}
SELECT t.* FROM article_tags atr LEFT JOIN article a ON a.article_id = atr.article_id = a.article_id LEFT JOIN tag t ON atr.tag_id = t.tag_id WHERE atr.article_id = #{articleId};
